      • appendMarkdowns

        public MessageBuilder appendMarkdowns(java.lang.String content,
                                      IMessage.Markdown... types)
        Append multiple markdowns to the content. Markdowns can be layered, for example, ~~**This is strikeout with bold**~~.

        Strikeout with bold

        can be achieved by using: 
        #appendMarkdowns("This is strikeout with bold", Markdown.STRIKEOUT, Markdown.BOLD)
        There are specific methods for code block markdowns.
        Parameters:
        content - The string to be italics.
        types - The varargs of markdown types.
        Returns:
        MessageBuilder for chaining.
        See Also:
        appendCodeBlock(String), appendCodeBlock(String, String)

      • appendCodeBlock

      • appendLink

        public MessageBuilder appendLink(java.lang.String link,
                                 boolean shouldAutoEmbed)
        Append a link to the content. If the link does not start with http or https, it will automatically be prefixed with https://.
        Discord automatically embed the link for the client's view. To disable that, passes true to the shouldAutoEmbed parameter. For more information about Auto Embed, see this article.
        Parameters:
        link - The link to append, might not start with http or https.
        shouldAutoEmbed - True to let discord embed the link, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        MessageBuilder for chaining.
